  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:ait.opetaja.ee:98afe8bb76286bce36663d9b62259b6f9c1ce865</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>1</catalog>
            <entry>98afe8bb76286bce36663d9b62259b6f9c1ce865</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="et">Poolitamine, 3. klassile</string>
            <string language="en">Revision of syllabising</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Änderung von Syllabising</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Révision de syllabising</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Revisão de syllabising</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Revisione di syllabising</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αναθεώρηση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Revisión de syllabising</string>
          </title>
          <language>et</language>
          <description>
            <string language="et">Õppematerjal on mõeldud kasutamiseks 3. klassis, I kooliaste. Poolitamise kinnistamine. Elektrooniline tööleht: õppida kasutama Microsoft Wordis nooltega liikumist, mõttekriipsu kasutamist, sõnade värvimist</string>
            <string language="en">Study material for the 3rd form, 1st term. Revision of syllabising. Electronic worksheet- learn to move with arrows in a word document, to use dash and colouring words.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="et">Algõpetus</string>
            <string language="et">Eesti keel</string>
            <string language="et">õigekiri</string>
            <string language="en">Basic School</string>
            <string language="en">Estonian language</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Studieren Sie Material für das 3. Formular, 1. 
Bezeichnung. Änderung von Syllabising. Elektronischer 
Bogen erlernen, mit Pfeilen in einem Wortdokument, auf 
Gebrauchgedankenstrich und Farbtonwörter zu bewegen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Étudiez le matériel pour la 3ème forme, la 
1ère limite. Révision de syllabising. Le tableau 
électronique apprennent à se déplacer avec des flèches dans un 
document de mot, au tiret d'utilisation et aux mots de coloration.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estude o material para o ó formulário, 1o 
termo. Revisão de syllabising. A folha eletrônica 
aprende mover-se com setas em um original da palavra, para o traço do
uso e as palavras da coloração.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi il materiale per la terza forma, primo 
termine. Revisione di syllabising. Il foglio di lavoro 
elettronico impara muoversi con le frecce in un documento di parola, 
verso il precipitare di uso e le parole di colouring.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Υλικό μελέτης για την 3$η μορφή, 1$ος όρος. 
Αναθεώρηση. Ηλεκτρονικό φύλλο εργασίας - μάθετε να 
κινείστε με τα βέλη σε ένα έγγραφο λέξης, για να χρησιμοποιήσουν
τις λέξεις εξόρμησης και χρωματισμού.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estudie el material para la 3ro forma, 1r 
término. Revisión de syllabising. La hoja de trabajo 
electrónica aprende moverse con las flechas en un documento de la 
palabra, a la rociada del uso y a las palabras del colorante.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grundlegende Schule</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Estnische Sprache</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">École de base</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Langage estonien</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Escola Básica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Língua estonian</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scuola Di base</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lingua estone</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βασικό σχολείο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εσθονική γλώσσα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Escuela Básica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Lenguaje estonio</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
